plot: Two legendary cowboys meet in a point to talk about old times and meet in a match marked by the pact between gunmen. The wife of one of them try to prevent this conflict without success.
title: Erase una vez... El western
plot_es: Two legendary cowboys meet in a point to talk about old times and meet in a match marked by the pact between gunmen. The wife of one of them try to prevent this conflict without success.
plot_en: Two legendary cowboys meet in a point to talk about old times and meet in a match marked by the pact between gunmen. The wife of one of them try to prevent this conflict without success.
